comment: Proof of ~ ax-9 from ~ ax9v1 and ~ ax9v2 , proving sufficiency of the conjunction of the latter two weakened versions of ~ ax9v , which is itself a weakened version of ~ ax-9 . (Contributed by BJ, 7-Dec-2020.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 11-Apr-2021.)
